Canton, TX

**Due to the inclement weather, trash service will not run on Wednesday, Jan. 28, 2026. [Learn More](https://www.cantontx.gov/alert_detail_T27_R2.php)**

* City Council

City Council
------------

|  |
| --- |
| **MISSION STATEMENT** ***The City of Canton will build upon its unique heritage; provide quality housing, infrastructure and parks; promote economic development, tourism and business and employee opportunities; and manage growth to meet the needs of its current and future residents.*** |

  
**The Canton City Council holds regular meetings at 6:00 p.m. on the third Tuesday of each month at City Hall, 201 N. Buffalo Canton. Anyone wishing to address the council during a regular meeting may sign up to fifteen minutes prior to the meeting to speak for three minutes.**  
  

2025-2026 City Council

  
**To send mail to the Mayor or Councilmembers, use 201 N. Buffalo, Canton, TX 75103.**  
  

|  |  |  |  |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| **Council Names** | **Position** | **Term** | **Email** |
| **Lou Ann Berry** | **Mayor** | **05/2025 to 05/2027** | **leverett@cantontex.com** |
| **Blake Fowler** | **Mayor Pro Tem** | **05/2024 to 05/2026** | **bfowler@cantontx.gov** |
| **Jim Fuller** | **Councilmember** | **05/2024 to 05/2026** | **jfuller@cantontx.gov** |
| **Vicki Goodson** | **Councilmember** | **12/2025 to 05/2026** |  |
| **Chase Melton** | **Councilmember** | **05/2024 to 05/2026** | **cmelton@cantontx.gov** |
| **Randon Sumner** | **Councilmember** | **05/2025 to 05/2027** | **rsumner@cantontex.com** |
